Name: Bella Vista

Name: Bella Vista
Review Text: Lovely food , great service ,friendly staff and good prices.

Name: Bella Vista
Review Text: The most friendly place, you can feel the owner's touch. They also love dogs! There is a very nice bulldog as a Mascot

Name: Bella Vista
Review Text: Always excellent cappuccino and Italian sandwiches. Ideal for lunch

Name: Bella Vista
Review Text: We went to Bellavista for our 30th anniversary dinner while visiting Amsterdam.   We had a great experience.  The staff was friendly and efficient and the food and wine were excellent and affordable.  Very nice patio seating that was great for "people watching" and soaking in the vibe of the neighborhood.  Highly recommend it.

Name: Bella Vista
Review Text: Very authentic and cosy Italian, served up with authentic Italian 'hospitality'. Fantastic food, all freshly homemade and good size portions. Great location and beautiful atmosphere. Spaghetti Vongole - the best I have ever had in my life! A must go!

Name: Bella Vista
Review Text: I went with my family this evening to Bellavista, I live down the road in Amsterdam so I know the area. Fantastic looking restaurant and very nice atmosphere inside. The food is exceptional quality. The reason I only give it three stars, â€¦

Name: Bella Vista
Review Text: Beautiful restaurant. I liked the bread board it was delicious. I had putanesca pasta and it was good. a lot of choice on the menu. All in all a solid place to eat on the pricier side.

Name: Bella Vista
Review Text: i really can't understand what the owner of this place thinks. i believe he/she must be aware of the shockingly rude service (feed forward: do read and actually take reviews into account), but nothing has changed. i decided to give them â€¦

Name: Bella Vista
Review Text: I had dinner the other day with my friends and we had a very lovely time. The food was great and the service so nice even though it was busy. We'll be back for sure!!

Name: Bella Vista
Review Text: Best Italian spot in the city! Don't miss it!!!You should definitely try Risotto Pescatore and their homemade Titamisu! Beautiful design and lovely staff!

Name: Bella Vista
Review Text: This restaurant is the worst.  The service is appalling.  The quality of the food was mediocre and did not even approach making up for the dreadful experience with the wait staff.
